column5: I already got crushed for the title of this vid because the conditions weren't "crazy" enough to say that lake Erie is 'not for the weak'  ...but for anyone that fishes lake Erie, they know that it can get REAL bad and QUICK !... just a few clips of some tourny runs...  If you hate it, im sorry in advance hahaha.... it never looks as bad in a video but trust me, being in the passenger seat for some of this was no cake walk  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V5MMvcAgvx0
Awesome 65mph on water is sure to get your adrenaline pumping.Been there done that,still gives me goose bumps watching it.
